でもまだやりたいゲームですよ

Game developers very clearly made this a pay-to-win game. The killers that are free are balanced, but a few that are DLC only are extremely overpowered- run faster than you, jump through windows faster, instantly down you with one shot, etc. and there really isn't a strong way to counter them, making them very OP. Thus, people who play killers simply buy the OP ones and they're everywhere, completely ruining the game unless you buy more DLC. I already paid for the game, let me play it.

tl;dr version of this downvote explanation: They're banning people for falling into the exploits of their broken game, expecting all players to have read the rules (Note, there's a large amount of players who don't read updates like that, and now innocent people are going to be banned for this company's shortcomings).

I've been playing this game casually ever since it came out in it's initial buggy stages of being a campfire simulator. Ever since then, it's been a mess in terms of presentation, functionality, and developer input in regards to the community. When the studio bought out the publisher to handle things personally, it felt like things got worse instead of better. They only became more clairvoyant about their questionable practices, such as failing to adjust the game to address the issues that the community has. Examples include: The community complained about specific killers being awful to play. Their response was to buff ALL killers across the board, turning the already good killers into absolute monsters (Nurse will always be a god, but now Billy has less pallets to worry about). The worst part about that change is that the intended playability of very low tier killers (Freddy/Trapper) wasn't helped that much at all. So good killers got better, and bad killers still need some desperate fixing, as evidenced that the devs are openly addressing Freddy in one of their latest developer updates (As per 4/17/2019).

Where this game truly gets the thumbs down from me, is where they began to practice something truly awful. Recently, they included an update to the game that acknowledged an issue with Legion, where he/she has the ability to exploit a bug with their mend mechanic to make it last forever. Their response to this exploit? They don't fix it, they don't make it NOT possible, and now they are ACTUALLY BANNING PEOPLE for using their exploit that they refuse to fix or address or remove in any way. There are people that don't read updates to this game like it's a religious text, which means that there is going to be a population of people who aren't aware that using a game's feature will get them permanently banned from it and all rights to their purchases revoked. 

This is a foul practice, and is a showing of the company's poor management of their game to such a horrendous degree that I'd advise anyone seeking to purchase this game, or spend any more money on it, to go against the desire to give this game any money, as they are openly announcing to you right now, that you can be banned for any reason they deem fit, no matter how unfair, awful, or irresponsible they are. They are making the proclamation now that THEIR irresponsibility is YOUR responsibility as the player to ensure you are playing the game as THEY intend you to. Rather than designing their game intelligently, they are now showing that they are willing to raise their fist and plunge it down upon you for not paying strict attention to their updates and rules regarding the flaws in their game.

If it's too late, like me, and you've already bought this game, be careful about literally everything you do. You might get banned at any time if your methodology of playing this game doesn't agree with Dead by Daylight's views. I don't forsee them ever fixing their irresponsibility, so let the buyer beware: the developer disregards your feedback, or reads it poorly (I'm not sure which, at some times it looks like they're listening but their implementation and execution is awful), and is willing to punish you for their own mistakes in game design.

I shouldn't be afraid to play Dead by Daylight. But for now, I am. Stick to Kill your Friends as much as you can, but I'm still paranoid that they actually worked on an algorithm that will ban you even there, because that just sounds like something his company would do at this point.

Keep the above in mind before making the choice to buy this game. And be prepared to have the game taken from your hands if you miss a ruling the company makes about how to play their game.

Having played this game for quite a bit now, I can honestly say this game is definitely worth buying, I have certainly gotten my money's worth and then some!
I absolutely LOVED the horror classics like Friday the 13th, Halloween, Nightmare on Elm Street, and if you enjoyed those kinds of movies, you will enjoy this kind of game. 
Its a pretty casual game to play, with a match taking on average 20 minutes, give or take depending on how the match goes. 
Like any competitive game environment, you're going to have a few salty players. Brush off the salt, and you will have a lot of fun, both as survivor and as killer. 
Playing as survivor is pretty nerve racking at first, especially if you are solo but once you learn about the killers, their perks, and addons they could potentially have in the match, you will find yourself having a lot more fun. 
Playing as a survivor with a group of friends? I have an absolute BLAST! Its quite rewarding, even if you all end up dying, at least you die together. 
Playing as the killer is a fun change of pace. Its actually pretty fun hunting down the survivors and feeling like you're this god running around this map striking terror in the hearts of your prey...at least until you get a pallet to the face. Its still quite amusing and fun though.
The developers listen and interact with their players quite often on the forums, and they tend to really listen to issues that come up in the test builds and do their best to weigh the balance of their changes if they feel its something that needs changed. I think this is a really neat way to develop a game. Listening to us, the players, and making fair balancing decisions. 
I can definitely recommend this purchase and from my understanding, this game still has loads of exciting things planned that have yet to come so I can really see this game going far. Dedicated servers are coming out soon, which means its only going to get better from there. 
Hope to see you all in the Fog :)

Very nice game with very salty players.

1/6 games (for me) will have the loading screen not load, 1/6 will have only 3 survivors resulting in a worse match. Most games a bug will fuck me up, like clipping issues, sometimes pallets will be dropped and hits will go through and fuck me up anyway. In other words, I am trying to say that unless you enjoy playing around a buggy mess, you won't enjoy this game. It will infuriate you as it does I.

I only play it because my girlfriend enjoys it still, if not for her I would've uninstalled this buggy mess, I'm not really that bothered when there are bugs in a game. But when it's developers continue to add more paid content and not get rid of bugs that the entire community suffers from. It loses my respect.

Dead by Daylight

Durch eine Freundin kam ich auf das Game zu zocken und es macht sehr viel Spaß.
Es gibt sehr viele verschiedene Karten, Überlebende aber auch Killer :)
Die Karten sind echt gut gestalten. Die Steuerung versteht man sehr schnell. So die ganzen sachen was man natürlich so beachten muss z.B. mit dem Sprinten (als Überlebender) oder als Killer wie man gewisse Fähigkeiten einsetzen tut bekommt man natürlich nach und nach mit. 
Aus meiner sicht ist es ein super Spiel was man mal gerne alleine oder mit Freunden spielt. Die Lobbys sind immer gut und schnell gefüllt und das schöne ist das die Entwickler immer noch viele gute Sachen rausbringen.

There is a good game, somewhere in this bug! I would recommend it for people who like short rounds with easily understood objectives and the challenge of not communicating verbally (unless you are playing Survive with Friends) but this game is let down by how many problems it has. Recently the game has been so buggy that it not only has failed to connect to games (for example my partner and I both connected to a lobby, but the match only loaded for me) but now it won't even open. Before this, I couldn't play for more than 45 minutes to an hour without the game crashing. Until these issues are fixed, I do not recommend this game.

EDIT: the latest update seems to have fixed the problem. I give this game 3/5

Awfully developed, the developers of this game suck, but as a core concept it is fantastic. I wish this game had a competitor as that would force it to be better, but it is definitely slowly improving, but very very slowly. I love this game but the developers seem to be doing their absolute best to turn me away. The head developer himself said "play something else for a week, go outside" It's improving but there are so many issues at the moment. Quality wise it's a 4/10, but the concept is a 10/10 for me

E: A few years later and the game is improving a lot and has made a lot of positive changes. Less overpowered and toxic perks, and more balance changes that have been a positive impact. The quality is probably up to about a 7 for me, concept still is fantastic - easily the best asymmetrical game out there

詳しく書くと長文になってしまうのでおおまかにですが、個人的にこれはないなと思った事を書かせていただきました。
ゲーム自体は非常に楽しい(PC版PS4版買うくらい)ので上記の事が解消されればオススメできるゲームです。
잼있습니다.

ここまで一方の陣営を舐め腐った調整をする運営はなかなかいないと思います。
ゲーム自体は最高レベルで面白いですが、運営の調整がひどすぎます。
今のバランス調整でキラーをやるのはボランティア以下の奴隷でしかありません。

スキルレーティング実装からより最低な環境となりました。
ゲームバランスそのものは以前の4人パーティで無ければ足を引っ張るサバイバーが存在する事でキラー・サバイバー共にある程度はゲームとして成立していましたが、スキルレーティングによりパーティを組まなくとも足を引っ張らないサバイバーとマッチングするようになりました。

スキルレーティング実装前の「足を引っ張るサバイバー」がいる前提のキラー/サバイバー間のパワーバランスは見直されないままこのスキルレーティングが実装された事によってキラーが完全に不利な状態となり、上位層にいるサバイバーが初心者キラーに宛がわれる事も加速し、ゲームの試合内容も1人を集中して狙わなければ話にならない程につまらないものになりました。

発想や世界観は凄い良いと思いますがゲームに色々な問題がありすぎるように思えます。
そして何より運営の対応が悪いので期待はしないようにしてください。
後言えるのは民度が悪いのも問題ですね、自分は某PC動物園にいるので民度が悪くても普通に耐えられましたが心が弱い人はこのゲームを手に取るべきではないと思います。
それでもやってみたいという方がいらっしゃるのであれば頑張ってください。

I wrote a review for this game when I had about 700 hours stating I was no longer interested in what DBD had to offer, however jumping back in every so often to play survivor with friends and most recentely beginning to play killer a lot more has sucked me back in. The most recent update to DBD has done a lot of good for killers at the expense of the solo survivor experience. Playing solo queue survivor currently is hell, especially at red ranks. People seem to be dcing a lot more, and a bunch of very popular perks such as dead hard and iron will have been nerfed into oblivion. 

Killers on the other hand have gained increased amount of time it takes to do gens, and a 10% increase to the speed at which they do certain actions. This has made killers that are honestly not very good like Onryo and Pig quite a bit more viable, and the lack of dead hard for survivors has made certain loops less viable.

I cant not recommend this game because it is a very fun game, but if you are planning to play this game as a solo survivor just don't, right now you will not have a pleasant experience. With the next chapter set to come out next month, hopefully it can bring some improvements to the survivor experience without just going back on all of the changes as most of the changes are for the better.

キラーはボランティアだと、ここの運営はおもっているらしい。ろくな報酬もなければバフどころか、ナーフナーフナーフナーフ、負担だけで何も爽快感もないただの苦痛ゲー。サバイバー側は、楽かもしれないがそもそも相手してくれるキラーがいない。現状、どちらをプレイしようとしても、時間の無駄。今からキラーをやる方は、他のゲームが異様に面白く感じるぐらいに煽りに耐える苦痛ゲーでボランティアだと覚悟する必要がある。

我是先玩第五人格才輾轉知道黎明殺機(因為那個抄襲爭議... 你懂得ˊˇˋ 
個人非常喜歡鬼抓人(4vs1的不對稱競技) 據我所知, 同類型的遊戲應該還有:13號星期五(傑森單飛)、惡靈進化(獵人vs怪物超酷(淪為悲劇代名詞orz) 、終年夢魘(畫風最活潑 有種鬥陣特攻的感覺)  若還有其他的請務必告訴我!!  3q

當鬼追人壓力很大, 但也很刺激, 特別是遇到很會溜鬼或很皮的人, 歷經辛苦總算把他扶上鉤休息(?)的時候. 還有碰到可愛的萌新人類, 放完板還會自己滑回來被抓, 或者躲在草叢裡殊不知我在背後, 把他們追一追到手後再放去地窖 一起轉圈圈.... 無比的快樂~ XD

但凡是這類遊戲都會有揮之不去的平衡問題XD 萌新跟有經驗的團隊強度完全不是一種層次~~ 
這點我覺得至少黎明死線是做得好一點, 兩陣營還算互有往來, 殺手可以追獵 人類可以享受被追的刺激感~~

話說這遊戲也是bug很多 (經典台詞:i think we did a pretty good job so far) 比如破圖啦~ 人物動作壞掉啦~ 莫名卡住啦~ 技能沒發揮功能啦~ 板子鉤子變成隱形的啦~ 有時候會讓人很想翻桌「這遊戲還是快點倒一倒算了!! ˋ口ˊ/ 」

但過一段時間又開始想玩了... 真香!!

Я наиграл достаточно часов (1000) в эту игру чтобы рассказать о ней. 
+ в игре есть бета сервер который поможет определиться покупать дополнение или нет
- все обновления которые выходят в игре все они платные покупая игру вам даётся 6 выживших и 3 маньяка (это очень мало учитывая еще то, что сама игра стоит 500 руб)
+ игра очень интересная и затягивающая за обе стороны игры
+ каждый новый маньяк не похож на других 
+ в игре очень много интересных навыков которые можно комбинировать друг с другом.
+ можно поиграть с другом 1 маньяк и несколько выживших в зависимости от колличества друзей
+ манов и выживших можно купить за игровую валюту
+ маньяки с выжившими выходят 3 раза в год, бывают выходят слабые, но разработчики их бафают
+ все баги игры постепенно постепенно устраняются.
К примеру:
бесконечная загрузка из-за которой каждый раз приходилось перезапускать игру
      Этого бага на данный момент у меня не возникает. Правда он исчез только спустя 1 год, но все равно их нету и разрабы стараются все исправить.
 На основе этих выводов я могу сказать, что у игры много потанциала и классная идея. Люди продолжают играть в эту игру потому что она очень интересная, особенно интересно играть с другом или друзьями.
       Еще хочу добавить не давно добавили архивы 2 книгу. В бесплатной "полоске" на 10 уровней приходиться 2 приза, а чтобы получить эти 10 уровней надо выполнить около 16 заданий. А если хочешь скины круче. Более красивее и лучше сделанные, то будь добр заплати. И каждый уровень будут новые скины, плюшки и т.д.
     Ставлю игре 7.5/10

**Play this game at your own risk**
**Read before you play more than 2 hours of this game**
The concept of this game is good. 1 killer chases 4 survivors around until survivors escape or be killed. It's fun because it reminds you of the hide and seek game from your childhood, and there is also the adrenaline, the feeling of excitement when you chase or get chased. However, the incompetent developers keep making bad decision after bad decision. You will think it's a fun game and play alot of this game, then by the time you realize that it's a bad game, it's too late to refund.

Before we talk about the problems with the dev, let's get one thing out of the way first. This game is grind heavy. Very, very heavy. Each match you get around 10~30k "blood points" to buy/upgrade perks and add-ons. In this game, there is good perks and bad perks. Some perks are unique to each killers/survivors so you need to unlock the killers/survivors' perks by leveling them (which takes more than 1m blood points) before you can use said perks on every killers/survivors. Every survivors and killers has at least one useful perk so you need to grind for all characters in the game in order to have a decent gameplay (which requires millions upon millions of blood points and normally you get like 15k BP for a match). Also, you don't get to choose what perk/add-on you get, it's all RNG. Which means it takes much more BP after all the grind to unlock perks.

Next, the developers. 
They're bad bad people. When you stick around long enough, you realize how incompetent they are in making decisions. They nerf/buff what is not needed and refuse to listen people. When they do listen to people, they do it in the worst way possible. It's like they are holding a grudge against you:
Players: "Hey, dev, you're doing a bad job, fix this and this."
Dev: "Oh yeah? You WANT me to fix my problems? HERE, I'm gonna f***** fix this for you *ssholes!"
and boom, a extremely bad balance patch will come your way. Then they will rebalance the balance patch after enough complaints. This kind of stuff happens from time to time not a rare occasion.
The dev lost sight of this game a long time ago. Their ego is too big to admit their incompetent and to accept changes, which reflects on their game, a messed up pile of ****. 
Their CEO even recommends players to play different games if they're bored of DBD instead of making the game more fun to play.
A chinese knock-off version of this game called "Identity V" is doing a better job than this game. More game modes, more fun to play, and it's free.

Finally, the community.
It's toxic. The community is split in half, killers vs survivors. Both hate each other. They fight in almost every discussion post. Still, it's much more tolerable than the incompetent dev.

After all that, I don't recommend you playing this game, for your own sake. It will leave a bad taste in your mouth.

TL;DR
+Pro
.good concept
.fun for a few hours
.many people play it
+Con
.terrible dev, ego too big
.very unbalanced gameplay
.immense grind
.toxic community
.Laggy gameplay
Don't waste your money on this game

The quality of this game continuously gets worse. New content is created with only small fixes to the existing game. 50% of the matches I play are met with at least one player who has disconnected, or their game has crashed. Waiting time is extremely long, especially for killer. One of my matches took 20 minutes to find due to broken lobbies (if four survivors are in a lobby and one leaves, sometimes the lobby breaks and will never find a fourth survivor). The community is constantly getting worse, many players are toxic and will harass you in game. After the game ends, some players will post disrespectful messages in chat (I recommend leaving the match immediately after it finishes). I used to enjoy this game as it was unique and fun, basically playing hide and seek with your favorite killers and survivors. Trying to fix generators and escape without being found or trying to catch your pray before they escape, but the game has become so broken and toxic that it mostly just makes me upset. There are very few matches I load into that I actually enjoy.

とても面白いシステムの非対称ゲームですが
開発が初心者サバイバー・上級者キラーを見てバランス調整をするので
サバはヘタクソでもどんどんランクが上がり
キラーは全滅しててもランクが上がりにくくなっています。

そして初心者帯のサバがいなくなるので初心者キラーのマッチングは30分程かかります。
逆に高ランクキラーになるとサバが多すぎるのでマッチングが爆速になりますが発電機がつく速度も上がります。

なのでキラープレイはあまりオススメしませんが
紫ランクまでしかやらないサバ専ならオススメのゲームです。

バイオハザードRESISTANCE楽しみです。

クソ運営。
